extendedInfo.description: Suffer from backaches or back pain? This FREE TRIAL app will remind you to do simple exercises throughout the day and ease the painMany of us spend too much time sitting down during the day, which can often result in complications and pains in our lower backs. Fortunately few simple exercises and stretches can help to regain some of the strength and flexibility in the back and alleviate the backacheThis app not only suggests exercises to do, but provides regular gentle (or vigorous if you wish so) reminders at pre-set times. Each reminder includes the exercise graphic, making it easier to recall the routine. Keep it up and hopefully your back pain can be reduced or prevented altogetherThe app is a free trial and after few days of use, you will be prompted for a small paymentOur databases are composed from number of well-known and respectable sources and the information we provide is correct to the best of our knowledge. Yet, please be aware that any information provided through this app is for guidance only and should never be taken as a medical adviceHere at Clockwork Perfect we strive to make quality applications that are efficient, robust, attractive and easy to use. You can rely on us to continuously improve our products, enhancing their usefulness, your experience and maximising your value for moneyIf you like this app, we would be grateful if you could give it five star rating and a positive review. If however you have any concerns or questions, please do share them with us on support@clockworkperfect.comAll trademarks and copyrighted content are the property of their respective owners

reviews.title: Does exactly what\'s expected
reviews.comment: Great app. Promises to be very useful.
reviews.author: Anna Kvachakhia

reviews.comment: To good application .really helpful for people suffering from back pain.thanks for your effort  for providing this software for free\tGood
reviews.author: Nidhin j valappila

reviews.title: Error, rotating status wheel!!!
reviews.comment: When I start the app, it is showing the text \"In app billing isn\'t available on this phone\" and the status wheel keep rotating with only white background. Please correct.
reviews.author: Manohar S

reviews.title: I found it very helpful
reviews.comment: It\'s a perfect app for me. Very easy to use.
reviews.author: Kate Kobia
